parameters.name: FaceBase64
parameters.description:
Enter the Base64 encoded string of the face image.
> Either FaceUrl or FaceBase64 must be provided.

parameters.name: FaceInputType
parameters.description: Input **IMAGE** to indicate an image type.

parameters.name: FaceUrl
parameters.description:
Enter the URL of the face image.
> Either FaceUrl or FaceBase64 must be provided.

parameters.name: OuterOrderNo
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the merchant's request, consisting of a 32-character alphanumeric combination. The first few characters can be a custom abbreviation defined by the merchant, the middle part may include a timestamp, and the latter part can use a random or incrementing sequence.
